metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1963 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The contacts application in ownCloud before 4.5.10 and 5.x before 5.0.5 does not properly check the ownership of contacts, which allows remote authenticated users to download arbitrary contacts via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: jdstrand> Per upstream, only 5.x and 4.5.x affected

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
